name: Mitigation Playbook for Malicious Script Execution Incident
description: This playbook addresses incidents where an attacker executes malicious scripts to exfiltrate sensitive data by utilizing the Command and Scripting Interpreter technique.

if-condition--8395b8cf-bbc5-47de-9fff-e6.name: Check if malicious process is running

action--f6e72f0f-4e02-4c3f-a599-427aeda6.name: Kill malicious process
action--f6e72f0f-4e02-4c3f-a599-427aeda6.description: Terminate any processes executing the malicious script.

action--e3c257b2-1539-4a2e-b7e5-ccdd5cfd.name: Block outbound connections to malicious IP
action--e3c257b2-1539-4a2e-b7e5-ccdd5cfd.description: Prevent any outbound connections to the identified suspicious IP address.

while-condition--0bca7f6f-2a9f-442e-b138.name: Initiate full malware scan
while-condition--0bca7f6f-2a9f-442e-b138.description: Run a malware scan until a clean state is confirmed.

action--cda4aabe-0563-497b-9734-4f63e3cf.name: Run full malware scan
action--cda4aabe-0563-497b-9734-4f63e3cf.description: Perform a comprehensive scan to ensure the system is clean.

action--583ca376-475c-40ec-9b80-50986c63.name: Check If Scan Result is Clean
action--583ca376-475c-40ec-9b80-50986c63.description: Determine if the scan results indicate a clean state.

commands.command: if [ scan_is_clean ]; then echo 'clean'; else scan_is_clean=false; fi
